item.title: Mentally-challenged girl among two minors raped in Raichur & Hassan
item.description:
<![CDATA[Mentally-challenged girl among two minors raped in Raichur & Hassan
Mangalore Today News Network
Raichur, February 6, 2025: Two minors, including a mentally-challenged girl, were allegedly raped in Raichur and Hassan districts, respectively, police said on Thursday.
A second standard student was allegedly raped in Manvi taluk and the police have arrested the accused.
The victim used to go to the educational institution by school bus.
The accused, who also hails from the same place...]]>
item.author: Mangalore Today

item.title: Mentally-challenged girl among two minors raped in Raichur, Hassan
